Title: Text Page with the Seal of the Vizier al-Shahid 'Ali Pasha
Medium: ink and pigments on laid European paper
Description: At the left of this text page from Walters manuscript W.584 is the bequest (waqf) seal of the Vizier al-Shahid 'Ali Pasha, dated 1130 AH/AD 1717.
Keywords: Koran; Qur`an; Arabic; Islamic; Ottoman; Turkish; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Headpiece; Illumination; Manuscript; Turkey; History; Scripture
Provenance: 'Ali [date and mode of acquisition unknown] [Ex libiris (min kutub) on fol. 1a]; Vizier al-Shahid 'Ali Pasha, 1130 AH/AD 1717 [mode of acquisition unknown] [waqf seal on fol. 1a with the original shelf mark, 191, beneath. Same impression on fols. 1b, 2a, 156b];  Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Kemalpasazade (died 940 AH/AD1533)
